title: Awards & Achievements
subtitle: Recognition and milestones throughout my journey

achievements.title: Dean's List
achievements.description: Maintained academic excellence across all semesters, recognizing consistent high performance in computer science coursework.

achievements.title: Undergraduate Research Fellowship
achievements.description: Awarded competitive fellowship for research in computational biology and machine learning applications in protein structure prediction.

achievements.title: Computer Science Club President
achievements.description: Led the computer science club, organizing hackathons, tech talks, and coding workshops for 200+ members.

achievements.title: Bloomberg Engineering Intern
achievements.description: Selected for competitive summer internship program at a leading financial technology company.

achievements.title: Technology Development Program
achievements.description: Accepted into the prestigious Technology Development Program, a rotational program for top engineering talent.

achievements.title: Amazon SDE Offer
achievements.description: Received and accepted offer as Software Development Engineer at Amazon, working on AWS services.
